label: 半濟
本: Medieval Japan:  Essays in Institutional History . Stanford University Press . 1974
著者: Hall, John W. and Mass, Jeffery P.
説明文: Income division system in which fourteenth-century Muromachi shugo assigned to vassals half the produce of centrally owned" estates; soon became a veritable division of shōen. [守護、荘園] "
